A C D G I L M O P R S T U V

S

sendActionListMessage(TopicConnection, InitialContext, String, ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument, boolean) - Method in interface it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.api.monitor.MonitorEvaluation
Send a ActionList of rules to the monitoring infrastructure requesting an evaluation.
If the request is accepted, the monitoring will answer with a responseChannel where to connect
The actionList parameter is a list of action to provide to the Monitoring
To create it, you can use ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument class.
sendActionListMessage(TopicConnection, InitialContext, String, ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument, boolean) - Method in class it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.impl.monitor.MonitorEvaluationImpl

sendTextMessage(TopicConnection, InitialContext, String, String, boolean) - Method in interface it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.api.monitor.MonitorEvaluation
Send a textMessage to the monitoring infrastructure, you can use it after setting up connection, see MonitorEvaluation.createConnection(InitialContext, Properties, boolean) method and MonitorEvaluation.initConnection(Properties, boolean) method
